content: make your own sweet ballerina kitten with this fun and free pattern includes step by step instructions and photos to help along the way this little kitten is part of a trio you can also find the ballerina ostrich and mouse on my blog if you prefer an ad-free printable pdf you can purchase the trio together in my etsy shop here https //www etsy com/listing/632876254/amigurumi-ballerina-ostrich-mouse-and ref=shop_home_feat_4 skill level easy/intermediate - this is a beginner friendly pattern with some sewing of parts materials you will need - size 4 worsted weight yarn in colors of choice for animals 75g and slippers/bows/outfit 75g - size 12 mm safety eyes - black embroidery thread for the eyelashes optional - 3 5 mm crochet hook - scissors - tapestry needle - stuffing us abbreviations used - magic cirlce - single_crochet - single_crochet increase - double_crochet - inv decrease you may make items to sell gift or donate with this pattern if you sell online please provide a link back to my website for credit as the designer www graceandyarn com you may not sell make copies or share the actual pattern thank you thank you for stopping by
